lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the meantime, let's go ahead and get you situated with the character backgrounds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With this knowledge, one thought plays in repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But overall, I think I'm quite friendly for a dragonborn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn't enough, (drawing blades) the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But after coming upon an unsuspecting elderly gnome in the wood--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all laugh) Which is amazing, congratulations again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, as a heads up too, if you wanna do any quick announcements real fast, I think you had an announcement you wanted to make.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone have anything else they wanna announce or talk about? Are we good to start?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think my mom knows what the internet is.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Related, I leveled my undead holy priest to 64 last night, on Warcraft.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We're just about a thousand happy--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really really fun, it's fabulous, and you learn a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, Alex Jaffe, look it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A being that is psychic and consumes brains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nearly lost their magic carpet, but it was retrieved.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, you still have the magic carpet, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got it back, it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) After brief discussion, Keyleth and Vex decided they didn't want to listen to anyone's bullshit, and hijacked magic carpet, flew down into the chasm below, and discovered behind one of the underground waterfalls some sort of a mind flayer who was cast out from the society, covered in rags, kind of a twisted physical form, and after a very tense discussion seemed to befriend it under the guise of mutually agreed retribution against those that are oppressive to this whole chasm area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, this is where we left off the previous game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He begins to dart off towards the abandoned goblinoid village.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I guess we should follow him, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finds one tent, opens up and looks inside, "Here, here we can talk." Darts inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why? Why would he touch his dice? We're gonna die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're following towards the center of this town, you, see in the distance, a small light moving, back from the direction where you first saw that duergar camp, where Grog was assaulted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look back the way we came, there's some sort of light up ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stay with Clarota, I'm gonna go take a look, Scanlan, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys roll stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Abstractedly humming to himself without realizing, and calling a little bit of attention, at which point you began to hear some footsteps in the distance that come to an immediate halt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grab Scanlan, put my hand over his mouth, and say, Quiet, man, what's wrong with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a nervous habit! I'm sorry! (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With great power comes great responsibility, shut up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a gift I have to share with the world!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna try to figure out what it is exactly that I'm seeing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also have low light vision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make perception check with disadvantage, because you're under his arm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have any advantage on that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sure for you guys as well.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I say into my thing, "Scanlan, what the hell's going on?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, it's a friend, we'll bring her back soon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, well, there's a mind flayer here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys take a look at Pike, you notice she's fully armored, but dirty, she's got sweat across her face, looks like she may have had a couple scuffles on the way through here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's got a wild look to her eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What caught your eye was against the stone wall right above the ring of stones that form the fire itself, there is a giant symbol carved into the stone that is a protective sigil of Bahamut, the platinum dragon, which is a religious symbol of protection, used in different divine rituals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a religion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sure? Think about it, just for a moment longer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, are we all reunited?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know how long ago this transpired, but this was definitely left by her in this tunnel.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was left by a woman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lady Kima, the one we're trying to find?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's so great to see you, you look fantastic by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We fought a huge force down here, and then we ended up falling into a cavern, and then Keyleth and my sister found another one, what are they called? They're called-- illithids.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we found a rogue one, and we may team up with him-- or her?-- to go back and get revenge and maybe kick some ass in the camp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's rejoin our friends, shall we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we trot back over to the dead goblin village.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not speaking, just reactionary, and keeping a watch on all of you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sometimes we hug as allies, Clarota.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had to leave, because I started to have a vision.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I should talk to you guys about this later, just because--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm Pike, it's very nice to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Barely obscuring what looks like a round lamprey-like toothed maw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wanna reach your hand out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no physical response, the hand is not extended, but you hear, in the middle of your mind, at full volume, a creepy whispered voice go, "Are you to be one of our allies as well?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take Pike and I kind of pull her out of the tent really quick, and I'm like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay he's like a mind flayer, and we found him in a hole under a waterfall, but he's cool, but he wants vengeance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is that-- the thing is covering, so he can't be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he's gonna help us fight all of his tribe who hates us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we know for sure he's helping us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you help us understand your kind? Your history? How you've come to be here and who this individual is that is fucking with your shit? (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that the thing that you wear upon your head?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You and your brethren, without this, do you think as one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is the source of our family."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, one individual of your family sees something, the entire hive sees the same, is that correct?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you mentioned the Arcane being a stigma upon you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point it turns its gaze away, and slinks down into its form slightly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do your brethren put their faith in, if not the Arcane?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Clarota, we've already allied ourselves with you, as we've already agreed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'll help me free my people? "To be family again, to belong."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It would do well to at least maybe show us how you built it, and-- You get what I'm getting at, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like a steel beanie as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Basically, where do we get one of those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would take weeks to build another."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to take a look into it if possible, and see if it makes sense. I am a builder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can figure out something a little bit more jerryrigged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we were all hidden, we would have a distinct advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I wear that on me noggin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gives you a look in response and says, "This protects me from the influence of the hive mind, "my preexisting connection."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could we be hidden from them? Would there be a way to cloak ourselves from their understanding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Elder Brain is a collection of the once living mind flayers "of my people."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But once that is achieved, and it will be, what happens then for the Illithid? Do you return to your home below? Do your people harbor any ambition to move upward into Kraghammer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, what was that name?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sounds like a lovely town, Yug'Voril.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel that we could come to an arrangement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would require of you, at the very least, safe passage once we have helped you reunite with your people, for ourselves, and for a friend of ours who's lost in the darkness, who we are here to retrieve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For this deed, of freeing my people from this "insidious presence that is K'varn..."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm gonna just see if I can detect any lies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I adding to this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too late for the assist, unfortunately, 'cause it's already rolled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But can she suss him out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, music's not playing? I don't know if there's a reason for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he say his eyes, the flayer's eyes, are what put people in trances, or their minds?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So if we wear helmets, it's not gonna help us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It wouldn't help us at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll still wear the big bronze pot on my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cannot see with the pot on your head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but I'm protected from the flayer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you bore two like, ghost holes in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't need it, I have incredible warrior skills.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do their powers work with reflection?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, they can peer into your very mind."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But if we approach them using a reflective surface to view them, can they peer into our minds through a reflected surface?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If they know you're there, you're in sight, "they can read into you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They cannot sense you, but if they know you are there, "they can peer, they can pry."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any way to be hidden for us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would you want to rejoin your colony after they've banished you? Why not leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But perhaps, "with this deed, they can overlook it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So let us speak of specifics, Clarota.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that something that we need to face headlong, or can we maybe surpass them, trying to find K'varn, or this temple that you speak of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Bring him," so you won't be accompanying us on any adventure, or...?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And the general is in that...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we have to go over.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you say something about a temple, or did I completely misunderstand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where my people reside, that is where the Elder Brain sits."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll get there eventually, but first step is this smaller force across the chasm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said there was a big army front, guarding this general? Of duergar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, the general's right across the chasm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's just right across the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bulk of their army "currently is divided between that and the stronghold below."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy shot this one, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it's important to point out that your kin, this general, is aware of at least three of us, of my dragonborn friend, the singer over here, and myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think he knows about me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: True, it could be just me then.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I cast Prestidigitation on Pike and I clean her up real quick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you think your kin will react to that? What will their response be if they know that outsiders have come? If they've seen just me at this moment, plus a few illusions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You must think how to not be seen."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've never ever, in your life, ever heard someone else chuckle inside your brain, but you hear within the center of yours: (chuckles) "Think, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I assume that you would have already given us any advice by now if you knew a way? Are we stuck with our own resources?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I were seen, I would be nothing, "I would be destroyed."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So no back doors, no secret entrances that you know of, into the camp, anywhere near this general?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's in the bottom of the crevasse?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we pick up the little loch ness monster and throw it at him or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike's beauty distracted me, you shouldn't have cleaned her up so nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway, there were some creatures down below in the waters, are those anything that we could use, or should we just avoid them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need a lozenge? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its eyes narrow once again, not quite understanding the words you use, seemingly amused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I think we need some music.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so let's review our options, shall we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't charge, there's a chasm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How did that go with the little brain thing? Not too well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An entire colony of mind flayers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The bridge is gone, we have to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can fly in death from above.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Enough of us can turn into flying things to get you there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can repair the bridge if we had to, at least put a rope across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could disguise ourselves somehow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I know where we need to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, don't toy with our emotions.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you guys haven't gone to the war camp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We been there and we quickly retreated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He boofed himself out of sight and had a look around, and then we returned to the edge of it, and I kind of flipped the bird at them, and taunted them a little, but most of us haven't been in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have you been to the lake?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: None of us went in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lake? No, there's no-- what, there's a lake?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Isn't that where that thing is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The bottom of the crevasse, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's rushing water, that's not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there was a waterfall coming out of the natural--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the ogres were getting sucked under by something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we didn't go down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there something under the lake?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well I just-- I don't know if I should be talking about this in front of him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could go away from him for a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He will probably hear the thoughts inside your mind.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Clarota is totally fine to talk in front of. He's amazing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, shall I share a vision I had?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think so, Pike. I think at this point, we should just move forward.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Into the tunnels, below where the dwarves were working.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Past a jagged onyx colored fortress, framed in molten rock.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have you seen any of this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think an onyx fortress.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last thing we've seen is the lake, and we didn't go too close to it, because a couple of ogres fell in from above, and they disappeared like something grabbed them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't have him fly down there and get a close look.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we haven't had a look around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can cast Water Breathing on all of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't we send one, like Mars Rover over here, and have him go check it out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can always turn into, like, a whale.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Isn't there something in the water?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- run into the chasm is a bad idea.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I pull out my empty bottle, and I go, and I have this!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We might have a good chance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, is going through the lake gonna get us through to the general?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We haven't been down to the water's surface.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the best-case scenario? What, we come up behind them? It's still gonna be a fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But maybe there's a different vantage point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can fly over them, that seems like a pretty good attack point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some of us can fly over them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even if we're flying they're still going to see us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's an ancient death thing down there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He might die, didn't say it was foolproof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, man, he's volunteering you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or some sort of disguise, distraction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is the stream down by the way?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It goes down every two hours and 17 minutes, it's been doing that for-- It comes right back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so let us know when it's back up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two hours and 17 minutes, that sounds like Lost or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Michael J. Fox in Back to the Future 2, and check out if there's any other tunnels that we haven't seen, or ways to go.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Isn't this the same water that you bended?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't go down to the water's surface though, did we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we went over the top of it, and kind of looked down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we did? We went all the way down?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When I was bending the water back, we were kind of in that area, right? That was that area, but the lake--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you guys wanna like, put me down on a rope, and I can just run around, see if there's any openings? I mean I have a lot of armor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well some of us can fly, so we're okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can attempt to try and drain the lake a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Keyleth said that she can cast Water Breathing, can help us breathe underneath the surface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have two underwater breathing potions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Control Water's a level five spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that's a lot of water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But remember, we're slow as balls in water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were having trouble, if I recall, just getting the waterfall out of the way to create, I mean it was amazing, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I managed to get it stopped--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, you fucking saved the day, but we're talking about--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go under the water, we're dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we stand on it? Anything, if we wanna fight it? Or are we gonna be fighting it in the water?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we can all have Water Breathing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we'll be underwater, where there's a death monster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not worried about that part of the question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's 50 to 100 fucking creeps up top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then let's come up with a good plan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe there's hidden stairs or something, like in Indiana Jones?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you electrify the water and fry the guy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before the ones we killed, or after?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do we know how far back the camp goes? How many are in the gate behind it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't a couple of you have Lightning? Can't you deep-fry the water?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I can make a giant whirlpool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clarota, you've been listening to our thoughts for the last ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what clear thoughts they have been.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you think? What do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You find yourself unable to breathe air."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it like a many-armed ...situation? (all laugh)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we can face Cthulhu, or little Cthulhu minons, seems to be our choice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't you fry the water first? See if it hurts it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can fly overhead and just Lightning the shit out of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 'Cause maybe there's a way-- there's a tunnel, and we come up behind them or whatever it was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That illithid took out my brain from like 100 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would get rid of a lot of them all at once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make you unseeable, but not invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make you a fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May I examine-- without removing-- may I examine your device?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glares at you and says, "Our agreement does not include this interaction."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It may be the key to returning you to your people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you go fry the fucking lake?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I won't touch. I will just look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just slightly shows you an element of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I understand how it functions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be a very simple piece of metallic material.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not any mechanical device that causes it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So there'd be no way to build something to create a feedback loop?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see what you're getting at.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanna try and see if there's any way that I can take a look at this and figure out a way to build some sort of feedback system.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to build a coconut radio.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't even have a laboratory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The time to research that, and the materials needed to do it would take months.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a fairly shitty situation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While all this is going on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because if they can't see, what if we blind them?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I love doing light things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if they are so blind they can't actually see us coming?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I believe Pike and I both have access to spells like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume that would make us pretty blind as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I attempt to build sunglasses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are limited when it comes to resources, as you are currently halfway underground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax could show his ass, that's a pretty white light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's as white as it gets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pale as shit. When I go to the beach, I don't tan, I stroke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I thought we established that they don't need visual contact to influence us, they just need to be able to be aware--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once they have visual contact they can influence us, but they need to make that visual contact in the first place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The dark, deep dwarves, "they hate light. This I know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it'll stun them long enough for us to get across.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we could perhaps put some Light spells on the back and the front of our shields, so that we are guarded from it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If you can make a pair for our friend here, that would help him out, I assume.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, can we temporarily enchant the magic carpet as a spotlight as we fly over? As a light death ray?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've seen you surrounded in radiant light before, you think you can do that to the carpet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's my book? Where's my Player's Handbook?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Clarota, while they're figuring that out, if we remain to be hidden or blind our opponents as we approach your kin, will not know our thoughts 'til they see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They need to look into you, by knowing you're there."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I fight one of your kin with a blindfold on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought if they could see you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't doubt your knowledge and wisdom, but I happen to have a ring with mind shielding, will that aid me in any way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If it gives you resistance to psionic influence, "it would be of aid, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It wouldn't be hard to get hold of some pitch down here, some tar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you can be invisible, and you have a ring of mind shielding, and you can carry a bucket of pitch to that motherfucker, you can splash it on its face, cover its eyes, and it's helpless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or I can hang that big brass pot on its head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you smear sticky shit on its eyes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, I just have to blind it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I happen to have a Blindness spell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It may still try, but to be blind, "it would be very difficult for it to pry into your mind."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could it still control the others, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you want me to go in there, solo, invisible, and try to blind this thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike and I can cast Daylight on our magic carpet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can cast it onto my shield, and then on the carpet, and we would have a double--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan and I could get in closer, and blind it, and I could stab it in the head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, technically I can also turn into something flying, I could back you guys up, if someone else wants to take the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd be the cover of John Carpenter's "The Thing."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did everyone hear Percy, that's a good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it, let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What else are we going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Surgical, special ops, seal team six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does Vax have to say about this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex, you mean? My sister Vex?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Vex, you look so tired.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I gave up trying to understand her years ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know what time it is? I'm feeling a bit nappy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Time of day has no bearing down here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: ASHLEY Yeah, we'll just take a nap and just get, you know, rest our muscles, and get ready for the fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm gonna sing a little song to inspire a couple of my allies here, if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dice would go away while they rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since I've got a little time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a-- What am I rolling?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's just an intelligence roll, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Proficiency, at the very bottom left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I don't have a number for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your intelligence modifier plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and so what are you trying to accomplish with this arrow again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, success on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna be Hawkeyeing Laura out at some point, I got a couple of them.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Anything in particular, or you wish to save it for after the battle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just am curious about the source "of your Arcane power."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I could learn a great deal from you as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you, those who have spells to choose, go ahead and choose your spells accordingly for the next day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♫ Me me me me me me me me me ♫

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♫ Molto bene, molto bene, molto bene, molto bene ♫

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (rumbling) You feel the ground begin to vibrate and shake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get up and look around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eyes are open, just sitting there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clarota, do you know what that rumbling is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We get advantage on that, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well I'm new to armor, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those both count as two failures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it was four versus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all hold still, barely breathe, the rumbling intensifies, and goes on for a good minute, minute and a half, before it eventually subsides.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thought we were gonna get a warm up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota says, "Many of these creatures, they pick up on movement, "in that sound, be wary."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What creatures are you speaking of now? Is this something--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is something worse than umberhulks, I assume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we've all rested up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It said if Geek & Sundry got to 1,400 followers, there would be some sort of a giveaway.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I had the same dream, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah guys, just so you're aware, every 50 subscribers we get, we are giving away an awesome Geek & Sundry game package.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be choosing one to win that awesome award, our wonderful package, so keep that in mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the plan is again, you and I, stealth. The rest, attack with light? What's first, what's second, what happens here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I need to take a moment to find some-- I'm gonna look around and see if I can find any pitch, anywhere in the goblin camp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got the exact same number, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find just a whole bunch of goblin shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's cook it up a little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you feel about lacing it with gun powder?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll make some fire for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goblin molotov cocktails? I like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fly, flea, mosquito, dragonfly, whatever you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We go in, find the illithid, and then we pop in, you yell, "Hey, Spanky," throw goblin shit in its face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or I try to blind it with magic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then it's on us to deal with what happens after that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might I suggest one other wrinkle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can make our way to them and release them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to cause further distraction, or to get some allies on the inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's possible they could be weary, frightened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, we understand, you want to bash some things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your time to kill is coming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, is there anyone else in the party who could help us with stealth, or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then there was the small stone barracks, where it seemed both the mind flayer and the duergar general both went back in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we gotta go into the barracks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well that's where you saw at least they were last time you were there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's our starting point, I imagine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we gotta get in, and then get in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's playing chess with all his minions until we take him out.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I should think that you want to post up and start taking out position.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do that at first, but then eventually I'm going to just have to jump into the fray.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, of course, onslaught to the rest of the camp, that we'll go about it too, right? Make a bunch of noise, a bunch of light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are you going to get Grog over there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna put a giant sunlight beacon on his head, and I'm gonna release him to the wilds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but there's no bridge, we talked about--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, how are we gonna get him over it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have an infinite amount of rope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we get it over there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius talks about making him light as a feather.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you can fly him, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't we turn my pot into a lighthouse, and then you fly me over, and I'll do like, abominable snow man walk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clarota, is there anything you can do to help us on this endeavor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can try to cloud his mind with mine, "but you have to swear to protect me from harm."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we can leap most of the city, "get to that barrack, storm it, "and take out the mind flayer that resides."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's set down right in the middle of the thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well I was gonna say, can we set down where we're kind of backing you guys up, holding the fort down while you guys go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all have to get there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get over together, get to the edge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but where are we going to make land? In the middle of the shit, next to the barracks?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say we might as well go closest to the barracks as we can get.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then you and I can get in the barracks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And as we're going down, you turn me into a fly and go invisible, and that's when all hell breaks lose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna start buffing people like crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gonna be buffing us like a vampire slayer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Joss Whedon up in this bitch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think my Polymorph spell is a concentration spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make you a fly, but I can't be invisible at the same time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If shit goes south, I will peel off and join the others.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll do it live, we'll do it live.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The moment you cast another concentration spell, it goes away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go ahead and I cast Enhance Ability on Vex.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our mother did it, I do it sometimes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So essentially you have advantage on dexterity-based checks, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we ready for this, are we going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm gonna go ahead and cast Daylight on--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't wanna be bright and shiny in the sky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A giant flare coasting over the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna go ahead and cast Pass Without A Trace on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's preparation there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♫ I didn't see the Vax ♫ 'Cause he's so goddamned stealthy ♫ Da da da da da da da da

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That wondrous rendition allows you a d8 inspiration dice, hold on to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vox Machina, let's do this shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn into an eagle, and I'll take the gnomes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is heavy with the plate mail, but it's still enough to carry with your giant eagle form.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, Percy, and I are on the carpet, and Tiberius, are you good to help Grog fly across?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Am I light enough for him to take me in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a cauldron on my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For him to carry you? Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess the rest of them are on the rug?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start flying the wrong way.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Back up, the other way, other way, very good.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wherever I move your head, just tilt that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we all in flight now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all taken care of, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, Percy, and I are on the carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about Vex? Is she with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, for the time being, because it's just easier to organize for that, is coming on the carpet with you guys, and is preparing in case she is needed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's just quiet 'cause she's feeling smug about the last game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's feeling smug about making another RPG right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wanna see how you fly, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you propel yourself with thoughts?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna fly in the middle between Grog and the carpet, that way my Pass Without A Trace encompasses everybody.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're not listening, it'll just happen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't play it that way, what were you saying?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was saying, if you're all finished, I'll just make you invisible right before it happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone, because of the Pass Without A Track, everyone gets a plus ten to their stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, however, you are carrying two gnomes, so you have a disadvantage on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to crest over the very top of the war camp, and looking down you can see now, there are what looks to be the beginnings of tunneling siege engines being constructed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there is a preparation for some sort of attack on the city above.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There does not seem to be any reaction to your flying.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good thing we didn't cast the light.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We can all talk to each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make it towards the center portion of the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll shake it, roll shake it, roll shake it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be what you saw, both the general and the mind flayer head of this encampment go into last time you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, can you turn me invisible now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we're still in the air, right? He's gotta concentrate on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are currently floating about 100 to 150 feet above the war camp, you do not appear to have been noticed yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get down there and wing it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we land on the roof? Or do we land right outside the barracks door? What do we do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys wanna stay up and we'll go down?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can start on the roof, that way that gives us time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I can't go invisible while you're flying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who needs you to be invisible? You're a stealthy bastard.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We land on the roof, we get in there, I cast Invisibility on you, and then you go do your thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're running the risk of as we come down on Duergar, going (groans).

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We would risk that anyway, either way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't we land on the roof and we all lay flat, except for the people that are going in, and you cast Invisibility.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is there enough weight for me get on the carpet at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was weight, but you're not aware of how much was on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know how much weight is on there, total.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Everybody, how much do you weigh?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The idea is if, I can step off on the carpet, and hang with you guys, then Grog you can float down to the whatchamacallit, and take Vax here, then I can, oh shit, I need to be near you to cast it, damn it! (all laugh)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's just land on the roof.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're gonna go in, we're gonna hit the roof, you turn me invisible, he turns him invisible, you guys light up the night, and we just do it, we just gotta go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't light up 'til we give the go aside.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We need to wait before we light up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If anyone takes notice, then turn off the lights.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do not light up until you see the black or greens of their eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, Clarota-- Clarota you have definitely picked the right people to assist you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got this! All right, let's go land on the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eagle flies down, you both, (wind rushing), as part of the landing, everyone make a secondary stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm like those boobies, that crash land when they fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bit of a harsh landing, from your perspective, but thankfully you have two small gnomes to break your fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whether it was taken from the surface or from the mines itself, it is just wooden planks that are all keeping--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's go in through the roof.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I still think we should stick to the plan of blinding it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So some of us need to go inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the two go inside, and if shit goes down, we light it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will fucking yell into my earring if shit goes down, and you guys gotta pray for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We look around for any roof access.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it is purely a functional roof for any weathering, rocks, you do see there are a few small rocks and pieces of cavern that may have plummeted here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there are a couple of small window openings, one on each side of-- [static]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, could you do me a favor of making me disappear?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit, where are my hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You currently, visually do not exist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you still have my buff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're like, flat on the roof, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a split moment you're a little sad, 'cause you were having fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can see the window, we pick one of the sides, I don't know, west side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a single pane? Is it an openable window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is about roughly big enough to fit a normal-sized half-elf or human.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take Scanlan by the scruff, and swing him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you grab him and you're bringing him down, you cast Invisibility on yourself, you both vanish now, all the rest of you are kind of holding your breath, hoping that now that you don't know what's happening, it's gonna go well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go ahead and just make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't roll a one, please don't drop me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gingerly scale down the wall, the stones thankfully are just haphazardly put together, where there's enough grip space for you to catch on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a climbing kit! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lower him down, you bring him inside, you step down through the opening, into the center of the hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't talk to each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes we get a map, finally!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're holding hands, I'm leaning way down on the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam and I have done this before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not gonna talk back to you, so whatever you say.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So you can just talk to each other through the rings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's sheets kind of tossed about, and it smells awful in here, but it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From thoughts only, can I hear him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tug on his hand to keep going into the barracks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I notice that his hand is weirdly cold and sweaty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I need to stealth, do I stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just have advantage on your stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's, we tug each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beyond being invisible, you guys make your stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm invisible, and I rolled a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both feel you're stealthed, there is one opening into a hallway here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have, does anyone have a laser light?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay so we're going to go down here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys step out, you can see immediately there are two duergar guards right by a door that leads to a central chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're gonna go this way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like how you guys have different-colored lightsabers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm inching up, I'm pulling Scanlan behind me, but I'm inching up to this door, just peeking through, seeing what I can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This looks to be like a fast-grab armory.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull Scanlan by the hand, and we enter into this room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just like the day we met, Sam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're past the door, that looks like the front door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is the front door, it is currently closed, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're gonna keep going this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh man, we're doing-- we're flanking!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There doesn't appear to be a doorway or entrance to the central chamber on this side of the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The shit in a bucket in my hand, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can take these guys, I'm not worried about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far apart are the two duergar standing in that door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about five feet apart, just enough space, like one is on each side of the doorway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are those red things right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are the small sconces with the glow stone, the red stone that lights the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're trying to get there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: -- with Greater Invisibility, so you can attack, and you'll still be invisible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull a gold coin out of my pocket, and throw it in this corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and just make a general dexterity check.
